== Pazhayannur (627753) ==

Pazhayannur is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 2048 hectares and harbouring 3895 households with total population of 16688 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Ottappalam]] is at a distance of 25 km. Male population is 8126 and female population is 8562. Scheduled Caste Population is 2333 and Scheduled Tribes population is 65. Census Location Code of the village is 627753<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate female population: 6631 (77.45%)
